mapper.select: select ui_num "uiNum", ui_name "uiName", ui_id "uiId", credat, cretim, moddat, modtim, active from user_info
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(ui_num, ui_name, ui_id, ui_pwd, credat, cretim, moddat, modtim, active) values(seq_ui_num.nextval, #{ui_num}, #{ui_name}, #{ui_pwd}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), '1')
